title: Emptying and Filling the Tank for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video for emptying and filling the Braava jet™ tank for the iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. If using Wet Mopping or Damp Sweeping cleaning pads, Braava jet™ needs to be filled with water. Do not use any other cleaning solution with your robot other than water. Lift the handle to find the tank cap. Lift and swivel the cap to open. Tilt Braava jet™ upward and fill the tank to the top with warm water. Close the cap and lower the handle before starting.

asset.title: Emptying and Filling the Tank for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video for emptying and filling the Braava jet™ tank for the iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. If using Wet Mopping or Damp Sweeping cleaning pads, Braava jet™ needs to be filled with water. Do not use any other cleaning solution with your robot other than water. Lift the handle to find the tank cap. Lift and swivel the cap to open. Tilt Braava jet™ upward and fill the tank to the top with warm water. Close the cap and lower the handle before starting.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: If you would like to wet mop or damp sweep, you need to fill your robots tank with water. First, slide in your Braava jet cleaning pad. Now fill the tank. Lift the robot handle to find the fill cap and swivel it open. Tilt the robot downward and slowly. fill the tank to the top with warm water. When it's full turn the cap back and push it down to close. Be sure to use only water and do not put any other solution in the tank. The cleaning pads already have a mild water activated cleaning agent applied.
